attributes.action: award Jack Nissenthall (Royal Air Force) a posthumous Victoria Cross for his dedication to duty during the Dieppe Raid of 19/081942.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jack Nissenthall,a radar expert of the Royal Air Force was attached to A company of the South Sasketchawan regiment during the Dieppe raid of 19/08/1942.Knowing full well of the orders issued to his bodyguards that under NO CIRCUMSTANCES WAS HE TO FALL INTO EMEMY HANDS. he still voluntered to go on this mission. Jack Nissenthall never received the credit he deserved in Britian, even though he was a hero in Canada.

rejection.details: Sorry, we are no longer accepting requests for posthumour knighthoods as they are outside the PM's remit
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
